instructions: Identify persons in a cooking/kitchen video based on their role. Use the provided labels.

persons.label: Chef/Cook
persons.description: The primary person actively preparing food.

persons.label: Assistant
persons.description: A person helping the main cook.

persons.label: Guest/Observer
persons.description: A person present but not actively involved in cooking.

persons.label: Generic Person
persons.description: Any other person visible in the kitchen setting.

persons.label: N/A
persons.description: Use if no distinct person role is identifiable or relevant.
